# UIInterfaceOrientation

**Property List Key**

The initial orientation of the app’s user interface.

## Discussion

The default value is `UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait`. If you add the [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UISupportedInterfaceOrientations] key to the information property list, the system ignores this key.

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIInterfaceOrientation].

## Orientation

- **UISupportedInterfaceOrientations**: The interface orientations supported by your app.
- **UIPreferredDefaultInterfaceOrientation**: A string that indicates the preferred initial interface orientation for iPad and iPhone apps running on visionOS.
